title: Generative AI-Enabled Teacher Capacity-Building Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and fundamental understanding of educational settings
context.additional_context: Targeting pre-service teachers at vocational education institutions, structured around smartphone-based practical training

learning_goals: Explain the principles and ethical considerations of applying generative AI in education.
Implement a personalized instructional design process using AI tools in three or more stages.
Develop and evaluate AI-integrated lesson plans through collaborative project-based learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
